items.sentence: Tom is quite often late for school, isn't he?
Both of my brothers are now living in Boston.
Ask Tom how many people will be at his party.
All three of my brothers are older than I am.
The questionnaires were distributed randomly.
How many loads of laundry did you wash today?
I wish Tom would help Mary with her homework.
Tom is going to love the gift you bought him.
Tom has been speaking French for a long time.
If you don't mind, I'd like to come with you.
Do you actually know what we should be doing?
I thought you used to teach French in Boston.
Tom doesn't really want to go hiking with us.
Is Tom eating the sandwich Mary made for him?
This one is slightly different from the rest.
It was raining, so we decided to stay inside.
What we were doing didn't seem to be helping.
Of all these cakes, I like this one the best.
Good use of technology can improve our lives.
I'm not exactly sure what I'm supposed to do.
